arguments.description: The name of the type to check for.
arguments.name: type

notes: For GPUSprBatch, it returns true for the folowing types: 'GPU', 'spritebatch', 'GPU.spritebatch', 'LK12'

returns.description: True if the object is of the specified type, false otherwise.
returns.name: bool

shortDescription: Checks whether an object is of a certain type. If the object has the type with the specified name in its hierarchy, this function will return true.
